description.name: User can add all types of citations

scenario.name: user can choose to add an article citation

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: "Article" is chosen as the citation type

scenario.name: user can create article citation by filling the required fields

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button

scenario.name: user can not create article citation without filling the required fields

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user tries to create new article citation without filling all the required fields

scenario.name: user can create book citation

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button

scenario.name: user can create inproceedings citation

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button

scenario.name: user can create booklet citation

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button

scenario.name: user can create conference citation

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button

scenario.name: user can create inbook citation

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button

scenario.name: user can create incollection citation

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button

scenario.name: user can create manual citation

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button

scenario.name: user can create masters thesis citation

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button

scenario.name: user can create miscellaneous citation

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button

scenario.name: user can create PHD thesis citation

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button

scenario.name: user can create proceedings citation

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button

scenario.name: user can create tech report citation

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button

scenario.name: user can create unpublished citation

given.name: user is on the "Add Citation" page

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button

scenario.name: user can't create two citations with same id

given.name: user has added one citation with id

when.name: user tries to add another citation with the same id

scenario.name: After adding a new citation, it is downloadable at the frontpage

given.name: user adds a new citation

when.name: user fills (at least) required fields and clicks create button
user starts download feature

description.name: User can upload a bibtex file

scenario.name: After uploading a bibtex file, the citations are added to the database

given.name: user is on the index page

when.name: user uploads a bibtex file with two citations

then.name: the citations should be added to the database

scenario.name: If the file is not valid, nothing is added to the database

given.name: user is on the index page

when.name: user uploads pom

then.name: no citations should be added to the database
